NodeComment.title: Node Comment
NodeComment.description: A comment on a shipment timeline node.

authorId.description: The unique ID of the author (Firebase UID).

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the comment was created.

nodeName.description: The name of the timeline node this comment is associated with.

/shipments/{shipmentId}/node_comments/{c.description: Stores comments for a specific node within a shipment's timeline.
